name: reaching
description:
reaching is a game about zooming through screens.

Run executable in MAC / Windows / Linux folders to launch the game.

Game made for Global Game Jam 2016 @ PETAL et al. in Chicago IL. http://globalgamejam.org/2016/jam-sites/petal-et-a...

Credits:

Peter Smyth - Code, 2d Art - http://peter-smyth.com/

Thomas Newlands - Code, 3d Art - http://thnewlands.com/

Luke van Oene - Sound / Music
